                 int width,
                 int height,
                 java.io.File filePath)
        Instantiates the current renderer using scene description Will set the canvas to (Width x Height) dimensions.
        Specified by:
        init in interface IRenderer
        Parameters:
        sceneDescription - contains scene data
        width - Canvas width
        height - Canvas height
        filePath - Path to scene's location. Should reference external files like background

      • renderLine

        public void renderLine(java.awt.image.BufferedImage canvas,
                       int line)
        Renders the given line to the given canvas. Invoked ONLY after this.init
        Specified by:
        renderLine in interface IRenderer
        Parameters:
        canvas - BufferedImage containing the partial image
        line - The line of the image that should be rendered.
